source.bf43bd54: I am using the head function to basicly examine the dataset (what parameters do we have?, how the data looks?, etc.)
source.202896d1: With the info function we saw that our data have mainly float columns,one integer and one string column.
source.a2c1f5f8: According to Histogram below, most common Score is 5,2.
source.cbe8b40c: The describe function shows us the datas mean values, max and min values and standart deviation in a nutshell.
source.5e79d797: The correlation function indicates that Overall Rank and Score has an inverse relationship. So if the Score increase than Overall Rank must decrease. Also Score has direct relationship with GDP per capita Social Support and Healty life expectancy. So one can say that if a country has high GDP,high social support and high life expectancy, it must be a happy country.
